page.title: 10BEACH LITTER IN EAST MERSEA
page.content: A litter survey was carried out on East Mersea beach.The following items were found: 2 empty beer bottles, several pieces of burnt wood,1 fruit juice carton,a broken chair,a glass bottle,corks,some rope,a few pieces of polystyrene,2 beach sandals of different size,a sweet packet,a training shoe,a cup,some barbed wire,many plastic carrier bags,4 cans,crisp packets and a beach mat. The sites of several fires were evident and there was a lot of driftwood on the beach. There were a number of dead trees used by wildlife and the exposed roots of others on the cliff-face suggested that these may have resulted from sea erosion of the cliff.
